content.6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6: tropical_island_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 31 2 Leo 21 31 2 Willy -100 -100 1 Linus -100 -100 1/addConversationTopic LeoDeparture 0/skippable/move farmer 0 8 2 true/move Leo 0 5 2 true/viewport 21 38 true/proceedPosition Leo/emote Leo 8/speed Leo 4/move Leo 0 3 2 false/viewport move 0 1 2000/warp Willy 16 43/move Willy 1 0 1/warp Linus 16 43/move Willy 5 0 0/showFrame Leo 16/jump Leo/move Linus 4 0 0/showFrame Leo 0/shake Leo 1000/speed Leo 4/move Leo 0 -2 0/jump Linus/textAboveHead Linus "Wait!"/pause 2700/faceDirection Leo 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 2/pause 1000/move Linus 0 -1 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Linus 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Linus 2/showFrame Linus 26/pause 500/showFrame Linus 25/playSound parrot_squawk/shake Linus 500/pause 500/showFrame Linus 25/pause 600/showFrame Linus 0/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Linus 0/pause 400/emote Leo 8/move Leo 0 1 2/pause 1000/animate Leo false true 500 17/playSound parrot_squawk/shake Leo 800/pause 1600/stopAnimation Leo/pause 500/emote Linus 32/move Linus 1 0 0/move Linus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Linus 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Linus 2/showFrame Linus 26/pause 500/showFrame Linus 25/playSound parrot_squawk/shake Linus 500/pause 300/showFrame Linus 26/pause 400/showFrame Linus 25/playSound parrot_squawk/shake Linus 500/pause 500/showFrame Linus 25/pause 600/showFrame Linus 0/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Linus 0/pause 400/jump Leo/pause 1000/move Leo 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Linus "Hello, Leo... My name's Linus.#$b#I've heard all about you, and your parrot family.#$b#It's really something special!$h"/move Willy 0 -1 0/speak Willy "Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.#$b#After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus here and hatched a little plan.$h"/playMusic ocean/pause 500/faceDirection Willy 3/speak Willy "Go on, Linus... tell him."/faceDirection Linus 1/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 0/faceDirection Willy 0/playMusic sad_kid/speak Linus "Leo...#$b#I'd like you to come back with us, to Stardew Valley.#$b#It's a beautiful place... not as warm as here, but still full of life... and I live right in the middle of it!#$b#I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...#$b#You see... I'm a child of nature, too. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'.$h#$b#But, I'm getting old... And I'd like to teach someone all that I've learned before moving on...$s#$b#Leo... will you come back with us?"/emote Leo 16/speak Leo "L... leave the island?$u"/pause 600/speak Willy "I can take you back for a visit any time!$h#$b#But, lad.... You can't live here forever...#$b#You know, there are other children back home, too. I'm sure they'd love to meet ya..."/shake Leo 500/pause 700/speak Leo "O... other kids?$u"/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 2/speak Willy "What do you think, @?"/pause 400/quickQuestion #I think it's a great idea.#I think he should stay here.#It's up to Leo...(break)pause 400\emote Willy 32\speak Linus "Well, let's not forget... the choice is really up to Leo..."\pause 500(break)pause 100\emote Willy 28\speak Linus "I understand. This is Leo's home, after all.$s"\move Linus -1 0 0\speak Linus "...It's hard to make changes. But sometimes It's for the best.#$b#Still... the choice is really up to Leo."(break)faceDirection farmer 1\pause 400/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 400/faceDirection Leo 2/emote Leo 40/speak Leo "I... $u#$b#I'll go..."/emote Willy 32 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Linus "Great!"/pause 2000/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 0/pause 300/emote Leo 28/pause 500/speak Leo "But... my family...$s"/playMusic ocean/pause 2000/playSound parrot_squawk/pause 600/emote Leo 8/pause 700/playSound parrot_squawk/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrot/pause 2000/faceDirection Leo 3/jump Leo/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Linus 3 true/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speed Leo 4/move Leo 0 1 3/move Leo -1 0 3/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 600/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 1000/emote Leo 20/pause 500/speak Leo "She says..."/pause 500/playMusic CloudCountry/faceDirection Leo 2/speak Leo "She says the parrots are all happy for me.#$b#...And that they want me to start the next chapter of life, wherever it may lead..."/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 3/speak Leo "And no matter what happens... they'll always be my family... forever."/pause 400/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotLeave/pause 500/speed Leo 4/move Leo 2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Linus 0 true/faceDirection Willy 0 true/textAboveHead Leo "Goodbye!"/pause 5400/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 2/emote Leo 40/pause 500/jump Leo/pause 500/speak Leo "I'm ready!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 32 true/emote Willy 32 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 400/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1300/message "A new arrival to the valley..."/pause 1200/message "It seems our little town is growing!"/pause 1000/end Leo
